Comment: As a parent, I'm confident materials produced by this program helped ensure my child was at a lower risk for SIDS. We always did "back to bed" (baby sleeping on their back), used sleep sacks instead of blankets, and had a motion monitor like Angel Care under the crib mattress. We were well aware of the risk of SIDS and that awareness kept us alert and informed.  This is just absolutely craven; truly sick stuff.
